segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s talk about your policy details. Who is the owner of the policy? Is it you or someone else?
segments.client_message: Uh, I thought it was gonna be me, but wait, I think I actually want my partner to be the owner, um, yeah, that sounds better.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So your partner will be the owner. What about the type of policy? Do you have any specific protection in mind?
segments.client_message: Eh, I was thinkin' about Life Assurance, but now I'm like, maybe, uh, I should consider Critical Illness Cover instead. Y'know, just to be safer or whatever.
